channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump, tariffs and trans rights: The Supreme Court gears up for a new term
item.description: The Supreme Court's new term opens Monday and is poised to deliver conservatives a string of victories. The big picture: The justices have loaded up t...

item.title: Scoop: Ex-mayor raises $1.2M to oust 77-year-old Democratic Rep. John Larson in primary
item.description: Former Hartford Mayor Luke Bronin raised over $1.2 million in the two months since launching his primary challenge against Rep. John Larson (D-Conn.),...

item.title: Immigrants nationwide placed in solitary confinement for weeks, report says
item.description: Data: Physicians for Human Rights analysis of ICE detention data ; Note: Data from April to December 2024 may be an undercount due to lack of mandator...

item.title: Most Jewish Americans say antisemitism now part of daily life, new survey finds
item.description: More than half of Jewish Americans say they've faced antisemitism in the past year — and most now see it as a routine part of Jewish life, according t...

item.title: Rep. Wesley Hunt joins race for Senate, seeks to shake up Texas GOP field
item.description: His decision adds a new dimension to a primary that has been centered on longtime incumbent John Cornyn and state Attorney General Ken Paxton.

item.title: "The Axios Show": Mel Robbins on staying under control in a world of chaos

item.title: House Democrat from Trump district draws a liberal primary challenger
item.description: Maine state Auditor Matthew Dunlap is challenging Rep. Jared Golden in Maine, promising to “take a harder line” against President Donald Trump in the ...

item.title: David Hogg makes first midterms endorsement against an incumbent Democrat
item.description: Hogg, who gave up his position in party leadership, but had yet to make good on his promise to challenge incumbents.

item.title: Trump touts Navy, avoids GOP nominee for governor in Virginia visit
item.description: President Donald Trump spoke in Virginia for the first time since his election, but avoided mentioning the state’s race for governor, in which his par...

item.title: Supreme Court won’t hear Ghislaine Maxwell’s appeal
item.description: Maxwell, an imprisoned associate of deceased financier Jeffrey Epstein, has argued she was improperly prosecuted.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
